content.detailedDescription: At work waiting to leave a guy came over to us an said he got hit with rocks or a rock like thing from the sky some of it burned an some did not he collected some that did not he rubbed a peace against a wooden post it sparked like crazy for as little pressure he used an set it down it sparked 1 then 2 times then faster an faster till it began to burn we put it in water for a while an took it out then it dried an started sparking again till it was burning again then we buried it a while an dug it back up an sparking again faster an faster till it was burning once again i felt funny about it an only touched it with my left hand which later got a cancer on it i had removed don't know if i can still find any of it but might be worth looking in to ufo spent fuel is my thinking its been a few years ago but the place is isolated an a good chance there some left there still like the maurn island 1947 case where the plain carrying the ufo evidence caught fire an went down sounds like the same stuff a guy i worked with got some an his house burnt down its been a while but thought i should at least make some report of it so its not lost to time an be sides it could change how man leaned to use stones to make fire if it is only a rare meteorite it hit the tractor he was driving not him an broke the shade peace over him an scattered little rock looking peace's every where i think it would be cool if bill from the ufo show would show up we could go give it a look see.
content.summary: Spent ufo fuel atomic  or necaler or a spent star material

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on our front porch

it was hard not to notice

i didn't know what to think of it at first and still don't


we saw it move into our view from se to ne and it stopped , hovered .


triangle shape. three very bright lights, seemed to shine one right at my 

video camera ( very bright as well ) . we saw smaller , glitter things 

falling from the back of it . then i filmed this thing extending a

pulsating light outward in front of the craft. it too seemed to hover

with the craft ( attached or connected ) . it then rotated towards us

then flew slowly , silently over the trees in my yard , making a u-turn

then returning to the exact same spot . it repeated this move 3 times.

after the last trip, it flew over my house , then upward at an angle 

and just poof ,,it was just gone. my feelings? ,,spooked, fascinated , 

excited , scared...Not even sure i trust telling anybody this stuff

i love my family and certainly do not want weird ppl knocking on my 

door. but i was also afraid whatever it was dropping might cause

a fire as it is very dry here in the mountains. started to call 911

but figured they wouldn't know how to deal with this sorta thing

and i wasn't sure it would be considered to them to be an emergency.

i watch the video off and on ,,and every time i get to the part 

where the light is right on me , my hair stands on ends

i'm trusting you ppl not to get me killed here lol.

but this thing went right over my head,,i was raised by an air force

master sergeant, i know planes,,this was a triangle ,black , creepy 

thing. hope i never see it again.
content.summary: Weird

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was outside looking east, noticed a stationary object in the sky, then object moved toward me, stopped for a few seconds,then moved south, stopped for a few seconds then climbed up, stopped, then came down stopped, object made sharp 90 degree turns both up, down, left and right.  i called for my wife to come see this, she was inside of house. it seemed like it was mapping the open desert, it then climbed high, continued south, stopped, moved west, climbed and stopped and hovered for about 15 seconds, then went straight up, out of sight. we have been living here in the mojave desert for almost 10 years, seen many commercial and military aircraft, never seen anything like this before.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was looking east,seen dark stationary object in the sky,moved toward me,then south.Climbing and lowering

content.detailedDescription: Dark shape looks like a face with some kind of symbles at bottom and could see through it.
content.summary: Was taking pictures of spring blooms and checked my pictures and noticed a dark entity hovering between the powers lines

content.detailedDescription:
Every night for the last 5 nights i have observed white orbs floating across the sky in a northerly direction in thornhill ontario canada. they start around 10:30, and end around 5am. some travel in a south east direction, but most are north, to north east. i have recorded several of these orbs with a hd canon handy cam, but the resolution is not sufficient to give any kind of real detail. they are so common, i have stopped recording them, and just enjoy the show. i would estimate most to be about 500-1000 feet, but a few have been much lower, i would estimate 200 feet.

they appear every 10-20 minutes or so throughout the night, the longest i've had to wait is 45 minutes before seeing another one fly by. 

a few of them will grow in intensity, and then vanish, most are just glowing balls of light though.

btw, last summer, they were just as common. i am amazed this isn't on the news.
content.summary: White glowing orbs flying north in bayview steels area

content.detailedDescription: Outside filming for a video shoot. we noticed 3 objects that were behaving in an unusual manner.
content.summary: Outside filming for a shoot. we observed 3 objects moving with each other, changing directions and behaving in ways that are extremely unusual.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were the returning from store when we noticed this glowing light in the sky that was moving erratically and it caught my eye. i told my son to get my binoculars and camera and i started to take photos and a video. i decided to call the police and informed them of what a i saw, about 20 minutes later they arrived and saw it but said it was just a weather balloon and asked if they could take my camera and i told them no. as they left my house and went across the street they took are neighbors camera and never returned it. later on in the week i went to my camera to look at the photos and my camera hasn't turned on since but i still have the memory card and found the photos.
content.summary: It looked like an upsidedown acorn

content.detailedDescription:
I left my apartment to go to mcdonalds between 8:00 and 8:20pm, at this time of night its almost dark but there was a little light left. sky was absolutely clear, no clouds from horizon to horizon.....From my perspective. upon pulling into apartment entrance i noticed a bright very pretty blue ball hovering over my building, around 500 feet above my apartment to be exact. i emidiatly checked to make sure there was no reflection of anything in my car that would cause what i'm looking at. after a minute of not moving at all i was fixed on it. i stared it down hard to make sure it wasn't a balloon or chinese lamp or anything that would give me a movement of blowing in the wind. it stayed absolutely still and to my surprise the blue plasma looking ball shot north at a snap of a finger. i mean it went from stationary to faster than a bullet in a blink.....That's how fast. i seen the direction it went but it was so so fast it could not have been made by human intelligence. i looked and couldn't find if anyone else reported something similar but from what i seen, they probably left it alone but i have to say something as it has changed my life. what i saw was impossible. that object could have left la and reached new york in seconds maybe even a single minute. it was beautiful and leaves me questions i cant answer. if i know that a similar report is on file with mufon i would feel a lot better as i don't want to be the only one who witnessed what i did. 

i will have words with anyone who says i didn't see what i saw or try to throw some explanation as to what i seen cause nothing in all of human history can explain what i saw. simply put, it was not made on earth or if it was, we are so far ahead of what is actually being told to us.
content.summary: Large blue plasma looking ball was hovering over my building and then at a snap of the finger it shot north at unspeakable speed. absolutly amazing.

content.detailedDescription:
8 orange orbs seen flying in single file formation about 500 ft up.

one orange orb caught my eye, out my living room window, where i sit with the couch under the window. looking s/e about 1mi away from me, a bright orange orb was coming towards me in a right to left direction. (if i was at 6 o'clock, the orbs were flying from 2 to 7 o'clock).  then i saw another orange orb, approx 100 yds behind the first one. then another appeared. then another. looking back at orb#1, it was now closer...Maybe .5mi away. these orange orbs were solid in nature, no blinking, flashing, or dimming. at any one time...My son and i saw 4 or 5 lights all in a row...Stringing from left to right...With the left light being the closest and the far right being the farthest away. it was already sundown, as this occurred just after dusk.

now the wierd part. all 4-5 of these orbs were moving slowly and smoothly, then the first orb light faded out...Then orb #5 appeared. then orb #2 faded out and #6 orb appeared, and so on. until all 8 orbs eventually appeared and faded just before hitting the town limits. these orbs did not change direction ever, so it's not like the 1st orb turned, and that's why i couldn't see the light. again, at any one time, we saw 4 or 5 of the orbs...All bright deep orange. we walked out front and watched....It was dead silent....No sound at all. we should have heard sound from that distance. all orbs flew at the same altitude....I would say at about 500ft up. no trail, smoke, or fire around the orbs. just pure orange light. missed out on getting a camera. 

note:  these objects were moving about helicopter cruising speed...On a windless night.  they looked to be about 20-30ft in diameter...Not chinese lanterns!!
content.summary: 8 orange orbs flying in line

content.detailedDescription: I was playing basketball on a school playground and it was a crystal clear day when i noticed a really bright glow out of the corner of my eye that immediately caught my attention. i stared at it thinking it was the first star coming out. the object appeared to have a grey-ish hue and appeared to roll over after i was staring at it. after rolling over it was completely invisible. i thought that was strange but continued playing and was left wondering what i had seen. not even 15 minutes later the object appeared in roughly the same area of the sky and was just as bright as before. it really didn't move much at all, it seemed to cloak when it started to turn or move. my thoughts were that it could be a balloon just floating and reflecting light and maybe it popped and fell but when it reappeared and disappeared in a turning motion i knew it was some type of craft.
content.summary: Obvious bright star-like object in broad daylight. no trail or movement. reappeared in the same spot after cloaking minutes later.

content.detailedDescription: As my girlfriend and i pull up in my car we both at the same time saw a huge streak across the sky like we have never seen before. immediately we gasped and turned toward each other to see if we had both seen it. the sighting only lasted 1-3 seconds but still left an impression strong enough that we wanted to report it. in eagle rock california many people light fireworks but this made no sound and didn't appear like any firework we had ever witnessed. the object made no change in direction. only a fast but long streak as if it flew away at a very fast speed leaving a thick trail of bright flashing light.
content.summary: Girlfriend and i coming home from late night in-n-out trip saw a huge streak across the sky just as we arrived at homel like it was meant for us to see

content.detailedDescription:
​sunday night, after 11pm, i was checking one of my water lines outside because there was a lot of air the faucets.  i walked out the back slider, around the lanai to the left, and then came back the same path to return to my back door. 
when i was just about up to my patio, i looked back over my yard, over my right shoulder (looking west), and about 20ft away, i could see this beam of blue that was maybe 12 ft tall was surrounded by a white haze. it stretched from the ground up, but was not touching ground - maybe 6 inches from the ground. now, this was only maybe 3-4 maybe 5 inches wide. it did not illuminate, as in it did not light up the area around it, it was self contained. it was like someone taking a deep blue crayon, and drawing a line down a black sheet of paper so that it came up clearly, or maybe a painted line deep blue.. solid, yet liquid looking, and on either side lightly shading a slim area of white haze. 
as i took notice of it, i kept asking what is that? and was trying to focus on it, wiped my eyes, to make sure they were clear, trying to make sense of it, even looked back at my house to see if something was shining though the doorway or window, and it just kind of disappeared, not all at once, but like how a vapor cloud de-materializes/evaporates. from time i first took notice of it, to time it was completely gone, was approx 5 full seconds. 
i stood there staring at the space that i had just walked through, thinking what the hell was that? 
then i started to really look and break it down:
it was in the middle of the yard. no trees, no furniture, no anything, just open space. 
there are power lines along the back property line, 30 ft beyond where i saw this beam, for lack of better way to describe it - i dont want to call it a light, as it didn't  light up the space around it. 
it was not raining, so it couldnt have been a glare, 
there are no lights on the back side of my house, nor do any lights from any of my neighbors reflect into my yard. 
although i had lights on inside my house, my windows have a brown tint to them and blinds were down & closed (horizontal), and the brightness does not reach that far into the yard. my back yard is very dark.  when i was trying to determine what it was i look across the lot behind me (apprx 120-'average size lot, a street, and across the property  on the other side. there was a street light visible there i focused on that i would use later to check myself. 

feelings- no fear, just confusion as i tried to make sense of what i was looking at. very aware of my surroundings.
i did not notice it as i returned to the house, but i wonder if maybe i did because i looked back so quickly, maybe something caught my eye? but for now i am just going to say no. 
my dog was at the back door, she did not alert to anything. 

weather- overcast, no storm or lightening of any kind. 

monday (following night) i checked my yard multiple times, looking for light sources etc. the neighbors were outside, and their lighting on their lanai did not reach much farther past the property line, due to trees/ shrubs, and their screened lania  the lighting on their patio is the normal white lighting. 

tuesday night i went out again, once around 930, and it appeared too light out yet, my yard was not as dark as it was sunday night. so i went back out at 1030 -11pm and my yard was now full dark, i could not see past 15 ft. same as sunday night. i stepped outside and looked around. i checked for the street light, same spot, no difference there,  i looked at my house, nothing reflective, same lights on inside, checked to make sure there was nothing that could cause a reflection on backside of lanai knee wall. i retraced my path that i had walked sunday night. i would have walked right to the right of what i had seen. repeated the same actions i took, looking back over my shoulder at the same spot...  there was nothing that could have created what i saw. . 
when sharing with a friend, she asked me if there was anything in the sky? how far up the light went, i did not look up into the sky, i was focused on the area right in front of me, its location. 

over a week has passed, and every night i go outside and look around. i reviewed the ground where i saw the beam, nothing different. i have walked out past my property line into the empty lot behind my house, and observed my house for lighting etc, nothing reflects against my house, i have no yard lights. i have researched this, i have emailed the state director, as well as other mufon field investigators. i am also a member of mufon.
i am attaching a picture that i found online that closely resembles the shape, consistency,color, & fading of what i saw.  
the blue was darker, much denser- i could not see through it. 
after 3 full seconds it appeared to just evaporate, losing its straight edges. what i saw was vertical, straight up and down. 

i do not know what i saw. i am reporting this should someone else have a similar experience. i tired to include as many details as i could.
content.summary: This was a beam of blue  w/ white edges

content.detailedDescription: I have previously reported several instances of my encounters with "flying sheet of paper". rather than being something that is simply a random occurrence, my previous encounters while at work clearly demonstrated that this thing was being dispatched when i would come outside for my breaks. well now this thing has showed up where i live. at last, i have finally caught this thing on video. this will mark my sixth encounter with "flying sheet of paper". in this video, it doesn't do anything that is in particularly spectacular, other than fly along in a straight and steady fashion, that would in itself seem to be out of the ordinary. you would expect a sheet of paper, being carried along by the wind, to bounce around in its trajectory across the sky. sorry i wasn't able to zoom in for a closer look. when i spotted this thing, i was out in the open, fully exposed to sunlight, and couldn't make out anything clearly in my camera's viewfinder other than the clouds you see in the background. so i had to shoot this video by pointing my camera in the general direction of what i could see directly by looking up. without the clouds in the background on my camera's viewfinder, i would have had no reference points for aiming my camera. with this being my sixth encounter with "flying sheet of paper", i am still uncertains as to whether this might be extraterrestrial in origin, as in some utility craft of alien origin, or terrestrial, and is being controlled by otherworldly visitors. it is certainly something akin to a signature business card, telling me that i'm still involved in a bizarre relationship with wtf.
content.summary: My sixth encounter with "flying sheet of paper"

content.detailedDescription: Again! this time there is no doubt this time i saw an ufo flying pass through my housing areas at taman sinar baru lorong kenawai 7d phase 4 at 7:38pm today. it's speed was like a flying jet plane flying to north east but more to the eastward.
content.summary: I was going to prayer meeting at 8pm and when my dad was fixing the auto gate i went out to look at the sky oh before that i was ready change my clothes and go to balcony and look up and saw big shining object shone like star and fly to north eastward

content.detailedDescription:
A friend of mine observed a object that was hovering above the treetops in chippawa, ontario. it was first seen in the east direction then changed direction to the west, headed to buffalo and was observed to be lowering or landing in buffalo between two flashing towers. the object appeared to be triangle like and had 3 orangish-red lights at 3 points, my friend said he could just see the outline of the shape of the object. also in the middle were lights were the yellowish-orange color and were lit up all at once.

this is a rare sighting, i went with my friend later to try to see it again but had no luck.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Friend observed ufo while driving countryside

content.detailedDescription: Over lake garda a parashutist hung up in the air. i tried to take picture of him. after picture was taken i saw a bright spot on it. scaling the pic i realised that there was six bright shining spots on the big spot.
content.summary: Strange spot with lighting spots within it.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting inside my truck outside of my house i had just gotten home from the store and i looked out my window and saw the light flashing so i asked my girlfriend if she could see it as well and we stared at it for a good 10 minutes we noticed it was hovering it would blink multiple colors and it appeared to be spinning and moving up and down but in the same area. we were looking at it and i looked at the rest of the sky and saw the same thing further out and it looked like they were communicating both blinking and the one which was further kept getting closer and closer to the first one but very slowly. i couldn't grasp what it could possibly be and my reaction to this at first i was freaked out and both me and my girlfriend were scared neither of us leaving the truck. this kept going for about an hour maybe more. i would like to hear back on what you think it could possibly be.  also- when we tried to take a photo or video of it, it wouldn't show up on my phone but i could see it perfectly. when i put my phone up to the area it just looked all black.
content.summary: Weird flashing lights constantly blinking in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I and my ex-girlfriend were stargazing the night after thanksgiving on friday, november 26th 2010. it was around 10:30pm. it was in st. tammany parish in louisiana.

i have been an amateur astronomer for about 25 years so i am familiar with constellations, standard aircraft that can be confused with astronomical objects, and identifying satellites from aircraft and stars.

around 10:30pm we were sitting in lawn chairs with all of the lights turned off outside and had been sitting there from about 30-45 minutes so we had our night vision. we were looking up when we saw a black triangular craft, i say triangular because the three points of light which were white and steady existed at all three corners like a perfect pyramid facing south. the craft made no sound at all. it was much higher that conventional aircraft which make noise, have blinking aerial lights and move generally in an arc across the sky. this was steady and moved very fast. we noticed it when it was directly overhead at about a 90 degree angle. we followed it down to about 30 degrees above the horizon when it was lost in the trees from our point of view. it was not a satellite as it was not high enough for that, nor was it a conventional aircraft as it had none of the regular lights. it was very high above the ground and it was moving extremely fast to be covering great distances at the speed it was traveling. given its speed, and height i also must conclude that it was quite large (over 100 feet in diameter) to be a visible as it was.

there was very little directly south of our location in st. tammany parish. only the caribbean ocean was directly south, as at its speed it could not possibly have slowed down or prepared to land in new orleans like a conventional aircraft.
content.summary: Triangular shaped craft with three lights at points heading directly north to south. silent.

content.detailedDescription: On july 28, 2015 at 9:45 pm i walked out my front door to have a cigarette. the sky was clear, and no clouds were visible. i looked up as i do every night, and i seen an object roughly 20,000 to 30,000 feet above me travelling from south to north {washington state to alaska}. there were no blinking lights, just 1 solid light that went from dull to bright 3 times, then the light just went out, and the object disappeared. planes in this area travel east to west or west to east {vancouver to ontario or ontario to vancouver} there were no sounds from the object. i always here jets when they pass over our house 20-30 times per day.
content.summary: Object was travelling south to north in chilliwack bc. planes travel west and east here.

content.detailedDescription:
I walked outside to have a smoke and look at some of the fireworks. the objects i saw were not fireworks. at that time the only part of the sky i could see was the north west area.When i looked up about a mile up to the northwest i observed six, of maybe seven, red orbs moving silently through the sky. three or four moved off to the north and out of my site. three moved off to the west over the gulf of mexico. the whole sighting took maybe eight minutes at the most. after seeing the orbs i reported it to a ufo facebook page and asked if anyone saw it. i had several replies and some people even videoed the orbs. people saw this all up and down the eastern united states.
i have seen two of these orbs also at different times.One sighting i called my sister outside and she saw it also.
content.summary: I witnesses 6 red orbs in the sky. three moved off to the west and 3 moved off to the north.

content.detailedDescription:
I was just standing on my balcony observing the moon. a hovering red ball of light caught my attention. from my viewpoint it looked like a red light that we commonly see on high rise apartments. but i knew, there were no apartments at that location. after hovering for about 7 mins, it moved. the red light was replaced with green and it made a circular path, it moved very quietly and quickly. it returned to the exact same hovering location. after being in this position for a minute, it slowly moved behind a building out of my line of sight. to give you an idea of how high it was, let me tell you that if i was living in the 30th floor then the object would be at eye level to me. i could not see any windows on the object, it just appeared like a red light that wasn't supposed to be there. 

the experience lasted approximately 10 mins. 

i don't have any real evidence in terms of video footage but i'm not sure what it was.. but it definitely wasn't a plane or a toy. 

the fact that it moved swiftly, quietly and the change in light from red when hovering and green when moving made me think.
content.summary: A red light object hovered then made an apparent circular path. while accelerating the red light turned green..

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: We live in niagara falls, ontario and see planes passing all day and night long. we live right by the heli-pad, so we are very familiar with what's up in the sky. every night we sit on our porch and drink our coffees when i get home from work during the week. for the 4th time this week, in nearly the exact same spot each time, and almost the exact same time, my husband and i have witnessed a bright orange light that shows up and moves really fast and gets really bright as it's moving, then as suddenly as ot gets bright, it dims and  completely disappears. last night we witnessed it twice, 10 minutes after it disappeared the first time, it reappeared in the exact same spot it had disappeared or dimmed out completely.  then it started to move again, brightened  extremely bright and then dimmed and disappeared again. there was clouds to the north and south but this light appeared in a section that had absolutely no clouds. tonight shortly after 11pm we saw it again. there was absolutely no blinking lights like planes and helicopters use. this was a solid white light that brightened into a white-orange glow and then dimmed out completely. there was a helicopter in the area and it landed about 10 min earlier just off stanley and i just watched it leave right by my house with blinking lights - this thing was not a helicopter. it moved really fast and completely disappears every time. we watch to see if it reappears somewhere but it's just gone as fast as it appears.
content.summary: Bright orange light 3 nights in row same spot completely vanishes

content.detailedDescription:
It was back in the late 70's a friend and i were playing in my back yard. i was around 13 or 14 at the time...It was late at night when i looked up and saw this ball of light streaking across the sky...I figured it was just a meteor flying through the atmosphere but then shortly after seeing it, it then broke into 4 more pieces and formed a v shape and continued across the sky. i thought it quite odd that a meteor would do this but figured thats what it was and to this day not sure if thats what it was or if it was something different. it carried on for a brief while longer then disappeared. 

i have attached a crude drawing of what it started out as and then 
what it transformed into...Probably was a meteor and you would be
able to tell me but who knows...

thanks for your time....

cheers
content.summary: Orange ball streaking across sky breaking into 4 pieces

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of june 19th i was standing on my front porch looking at an unusually clear starry sky over melbourne florida, the next city to my north. it is very common to see air traffic at all altitudes and in all directions. when the sky is clear as it was that night, i often also see satellites and meteors. i also want to preface my story with the fact that i have been in and around aircraft all my life and while i'm not a pilot i have been a student pilot and flown in many different types. i'm very familiar with most civilian and military aircraft characteristics as well as aerodynamics and even (to an extent) physics. 

over the city in front of me i saw a flash. the duration of the flash could probably be measured in milliseconds; it was very brief. for a moment i thought i'd seen a meteor because i wasn't looking directly at it. but then it flashed again in a different location roughly ten seconds later and got a better look. it seemed to have a diffuse glow around it, unlike the pinpoint collision lighting of typical aircraft in the area. this repeated a few more times and each time was in a different spot. i was unable to see it move from place to place between flashes and i found myself really wishing i had ir equipment. the flashing lasted about eight minutes. at no time was there any sound from it. 

the following night at virtually the same time, i actually saw what appeared to be the same object come into the area and it was a spectacular arrival. it  would be difficult to estimate the speed except to say that it could easily have been over the gulf just a couple seconds earlier. it literally streaked in like a meteor. i want to be clear that i would not have seen it arrive except that it blinked as it did so, leaving a horizontal streak of perhaps 30 degrees (for a flash of such short duration to cover that much sky the speed would be phenomenal). then similar behavior from the previous night was repeated, i.E. a strobe in various locations, this time for about five minutes. 

on a personal level, watching this thing was eerie. frankly it made the hair stand up on my arms and neck because i knew this was something extraordinary and apparently technological.
content.summary: Visible two nights, second night streaked into area like a meteor, then stationary with random flashes

content.detailedDescription: At about 1 am this morning (7-28-15} i was sitting in my back yard when i saw a dimly lit object come over a tree behind my house. at first it looked like a low flying small private plane with dim white lights on the wingtips, i quickly realized that a plane will have red and green wingtip marker lights; as it got closer i saw a third white light, the object was very dark against the dark sky. i could tell that there was something there, it appeared to be a triangle shape, but i am not certain of that. as it got closer i expected to hear the noise of a small plane engine but i realized that it was not making any noise at all and the object appeared the be slightly rotating. the object continued over the house and then i lost it. i was facing north and the object was traveling from ne to sw. the sighting lasted about 10 seconds and the object was moving slightly faster than a small private plane would. no colored lights were seen. i am an aviation enthusiast so i have an idea of what i am looking at when something is in the air. i have absolutely no idea what this was that i saw, i thought it might have been a drone, but again, absolutely no noise or colored marker lights. i checked the newspapers today for a possible story, but nothing. i thought that you might be able to help. initial contact email only please.
content.summary: See below

content.detailedDescription: On my way to night class just at dusk. i turned around corner on mud street and mountain brow road on hamilton mountain at albion falls. observed at same instance a flying disc about 60 feet across and less than 50 feet in the air. it was leaning forward top to bottom at about a 45 degree angle with 8 pulsating red lights on the bottom. other than the lights the disc was entirely black. i assumed there was someone or thing operating it. at this point i was now driving parallel to it. for about a mile i was doing about 50 miles an hour when i came to a short bridge which turned immediately left then immediately right onto the same road. the disc appeared to slow down so i could keep up with it. now at this point i was directly under it and just behind it. the lights were still visible but the disc was still black. and i could see that it was much wider that the road being almost under it. i felt i could reach out and touch it but it was still about 40 feet up. i followed it for another half mile then had to stop at the edge of the escarpment because the road turned left at 90 degrees. the ufo kept going and as soon as i stepped out of my 57 pontiac to observe it, the disc took off toward toronto and was out of sight in about 5 seconds. it took a straight path out over hamilton and the lake and was gone. absolutely no noise came from the craft. the thickness must have been 6 or 8 feet. i was about a half hour late for my class which is weird because the high school was only a couple blocks from my encounter. i mentioned to my teacher i had seen a flying saucer and because of the look on his face i dropped it. it has been 50 years since my encounter and have only talked about it to a hand full of none sceptics. my parents especially were none believers.  thank you stan bell
content.summary: Drove into path of ufo very low very close

content.detailedDescription: We were driving down sidney st. in our town, observed a bright white star like object in the sky. we thought it was venus so we watched it, we observed the light surge to an even brighter white colour, extremely so that it caught our attention. we couldn't see a shape to the object due to the bright glow. we lost sight behind trees so we drove until we could see it again away from the trees. after it surged bright white it then dimmed to a red/orange colour. it was slowly moving sw still solid in shape and colour. we observed no flashing lights or wings on the object. as we were getting a better perspective it vanished into thin air as if it was never there. there were two people in the vehicle who both saw it.
content.summary: Very bright light then surged extra bright white light dimmed to a orangish red. moved sw not flashing, solid colour

content.detailedDescription:
Sunday, sept 4, 2011, dark clear calm evening in coaldale, ab, canada-

in my memory i thought i left the house about 8:30 pm but when i went back to the house to write it down it was 11:50pm (??). meanwhile the whole thing seemed to last only about 10-15 minutes. i guess i could be mistaken about the earlier time.

i was living in coaldale, a small town on the flat prairie about a 15 minute drive east of lethbridge, ab on highway #3.  we lived in a two storey attached townhouse (six townhouses in a block) across the street from the back playing field of r. i. baker school, a middle school. i was a school bus driver in the town of coaldale and knew the schools, town and children very well. this school field is sunken about 5ft below street level as it served as a flood plain catchment area, in case of torrential rains on the flat prairie the rain would have someplace to drain away. this large hollowed area would act like a giant megaphone, amplifying any sounds in the immediate area, like the playground at the school, and sound would reverberate across the field and bounce off our bank of six townhouses. if someone would talk very low or even whisper at the back of the school we could hear every word if we were outside the front of our house. coaldale is home to the alberta birds of prey centre, which has a large pond next to it, attracting many types of wild birds; falcons, kestrels, red wing black birds, canadian geese and, since the late '90s, a group of california pelicans- attracting more and more of them with each passing year. the st. mary's irrigation district canal went through our town east-west only two blocks to the south of our house (parallel to highway #3), home to many loud frogs that can be heard every calm night. after dark the town would be very calm and very quiet, except for the odd pedestrian. such a small town, we used to joke that we could have rolled up the streets and put them away at night. perfect conditions to stargaze, and on this moonless clear, calm night the milky way was clearly visible. i had been a brownie leader in claresholm, ab years before and was versed in astronomy and birdwatching. 

i left the front of our house to cross the street and sit on the bank of the schoolyard to smoke a cigarette. as soon as i crossed the street, listening to the frogs & crickets, i saw something in the distance. i hadn't even had the time to sit or light my cigarette, i just stood there trying to make out what i was seeing headed in my direction. coming from the ene was a group of black ovals. i was thinkin to myself, "what the . . . is that?  pelicans?? no, can't be. birds don't fly at night."
i moved to the center of the field where it was darker to try for a better view, away from the streetlights that lined the edge of the block. i was standing in the field holding my forearm up in front of my eyes to block the glare from the streetlights so i could see the darker sky above my arm- i would do this when stargazing to see the stars closer to the horizon and removing the streetlights from my view. as these dark ovals moved in formation, like birds do, i realized the formation they were in was not the typical 'v' that large birds use. there were no large flapping wings on either side of these ovals and no head bobbing as pelicans do when they fly, and still too large to be canadian geese. again, i reassured myself that birds don't fly at night, and beside that, canadian geese are noisy, calling to each other as they fly. what i was seeing was now close enough to be heard, but all was very still and very silent. i didn't realize that the crickets and frogs had fallen silent til later. these weren't birds, so what were they? i saw that on their current trajectory they would pass directly over my head, so just watched and waited, curious to figure out just what this was. it was not like anything i had seen before. these dark ovals blotted out the stars behind them and as they closed in they covered up the streetlights too.

sure enough they passed right over my head, giving me an excellent unencumbered view. as if in military aircraft formation, the first straight line was five vehicles wide, and directly behind those were three more ( i may be wrong about the numbers, could've been 6 & 4, i was in shock), in two tiers and deftly remaining equidistant as they flew slowly overhead. flying very low and too slow for planes- their speed could best be described as fast as a slow moving helicopter, but they were not helicopters and totally silent. they weren't in any hurry. the only sound i heard as they passed over head was a very slight 'woosh' of the disturbed air as they passed through it. no engine noise at all. they were the color of flat, dull black with no reflective properties, not even from the nearby streetlights, almost as if they were textured in some way or absorbing any light hitting them. not just ovals, they were an odd lozenge shape with the front edge positioned lower than the higher back edge. passing over my head from ene to wsw, diagonally over the town, passing over our two storey townhouse with maybe 20-25 ft to spare. they passed over smoothly, without any hesitation or course change, as if they did not notice me at all. i remember whispering to myself, "holy f---!" also knowing from a previous encounter i didn't talk about, i was sure no one would believe me if i did talk about it. surely no one would believe i'd had two sightings now! i could never have made this up, and it wasn't an area of interest for me. 

as i lit my cigarette now my hands were trembling. looked around for anyone else who might have seen this, but didn't see anyone. 
this is when i became aware that the crickets & frogs were now louder than ever, not realizing til now that they had stopped making noise while the formation flew over. i went home and wrote down the date & time in a notebook, it was now 11:50pm. i toyed with the idea of calling the police, but figured they would think i was crazy- then wondered if i would lose my school bus driving job. people don't generally let crazy people drive their children around unsupervised, i thought. then it came to me that if they stayed on their current path they would fly very near the lethbridge airport, slightly south of the city- but would they appear on radar flying so low? i remembered going to the lethbridge air show that there was a canadian air force detachment right next to the airport, and tried to find a phone number, but of course it was unlisted. i decided to let it drop and not worry about it and keep my job.

i was to have more strange prophetic dreams after that, about things there was no way i could know; quantum physics, a secret program i was unaware of, earthquakes, the frequency of earth rising, and many other strange things that i had no interest in. i had a bachelor of fine arts, so mathematics & physics are really not my 'thing', but i would go to my computer and google what i had dreamt about, hoping to put it out of my head- but each dream turned out to be something real and factual, which in turn would leave me a little freaked out each time. i never get used to it, the hair on the back of my neck stands up every time. 

both sightings, 1997 & 2011, would leave me 'super charged' psychically and having prophetic dreams and then slowly over time it would slowly taper off again. i still have the odd dream that really stands out, but i still meet complete strangers and know things about them. i still know when something bad is going to happen, like earthquakes, but it feels more like listening to my natural instincts. i can sense when a spirit is in the room-but figured that this was from my near-death experience when i was sixteen. i had never linked my psychic experiences to these sightings until yesterday when i filled out my first mufon report about my 1997 sighting, when i saw page two with all those psychic questions. but thinking on it all last night, there is a certain coincidence. these two sightings seemed to boost my "natural ability" to sense more things, bigger events, that 'supercharge'. only once during the first sighting did i hear a voice in my head. and only two times since, once after each sighting, have i ever experienced what seemed to be clareaudience, being able to hear a "voice" inside my head that is not a thought of my own. in 1997, on a sunny fall afternoon i had a realization that the n pole was shifting toward n russia, and i said out loud to myself, "the pole is going to shift, that's right isn't it?" as if saying it out loud would somehow make the thought go away, or perhaps a spirit of some kind would validate it for me, but i heard a voice as if it was right inside my right ear say very loudly, and clearly, "wendy!" that scared the livin daylights out of me. i never doubted my ability when i get a very strong feeling anymore, i trust it. after that afternoon i predicted the next five 6.0 or higher earthquakes, seeing a map in my mind's eye with the epicenter marked clearly-five out of five correctly, blowing my own mind! (northridge and kobe, japan among them) i would report my earthquake predictions to a girlfriend, we would mark them on the calendar, then we would talk again when it actually occurred, verifying my predictions and giving me some idea how far in advance i was getting the information (anywhere from 3 months to 2 weeks prior). after kobe, japan, i turned my ability off, depressed that 2000 people had died and i knew it was going to happen two weeks before, and no one to tell, no one other than my girlfriend & mother to believe me, nothing i could do to save them. it felt more like a curse than a gift. the next time i heard a "voice" was after the second sighting, later on that fall in 2011- i was sitting on my front step on a lovely fall afternoon contemplating all the burdens and financial woes in my life, wondering in my thoughts when would things ever get easier, when things would ever get better for me, thinking only of myself, staring off in the distant sky- then i heard as clear as day in my head, "what makes you think this life is all about you?" as i snapped out of what seemed like a daydream, my eyes seemed like i was staring into the sun, but i hadn't, i was looking to the north (on my left) and the sun was on my right. strange occurrence! it also turned my ability back "on", beyond my control. after that day i became very depressed at the thought that no great thing might ever happen just for me, resigned that i was only here to help others. nowadays that's what i put my energy into and i'm very ok with it, which is a long way from where my mind was back then. 

i know this whole thing sounds beyond belief, i am aware how it sounds. as with my first sighting, i never discussed either sighting with anyone except my mother- til this report. it does feel good, like i'm getting something off my chest. although part of me is expecting ridicule from somewhere, after i hit 'enter'.
content.summary: 8-10 black ovals flying low in formation of two rows over coaldale,ab,canada

content.detailedDescription:
I had recently moved into a 5-storey building, occupying the top floor.  listening to the radio while unpacking at night, my radio started to malfunction.  as i turned towards the radio, i noticed a glowing light outside (i had no window curtains yet installed on the windows).  i put on my glasses, and walked towards the window.  the window was almost completely floor to ceiling, with a large picture window in the centre, and two large casement windows on each side that i could open.

i saw a silver-coloured oval object appearing to rest on the rooftop of the smaller apartment building across the street.  this apartment building was perhaps 3-storeys tall.  the object was oval with a dome on top. there appeared to be opaque windows in the centre that were spinning.

within seconds of standing at the window looking down on the object, it started to rise up to my window level in height and then move towards my window and hover over the road right in front of me.  it had blue/red lights underneath i think because these colours were near its bottom.  

i was in shock and at the same time fascinated by what i was seeing.  the object had a smooth metallic surface, no rivets, bolts, screws or anything holding the metal together was visible.  it was silver/grey in colour, not dull but not shiny either.  the "windows" i call the row of white lights in the middle, under the dome were spinning.  i looked at the windows carefully and then i looked away to see if my eyes would be affected similar to when you look at a light bulb.  no affect on my eyes.  i tried to see if anyone was inside, even opening my casement window and looking out.  the window was opaque.  the object made absolutely no noise.  it was about 12 feet from me and large enough to stand up inside - perhaps 7-10' in height and 30' long.  i remember saying out loud, you are a beautiful machine.  

all of a sudden i became frightened thinking it would take me away.  i closed the window and was kneeling down and continued to look out the window.  it was in no rush to leave and continued hovering in front of my window.  i remember saying out loud, "do not take me please.  if you do, my fiancé and family will not know what happened to me.  who are you and why are you here?"

it continued to hover for another few minutes and then slowly moved away from my window, over kingston road, and gently and gracefully moved east.  

i re-opened my window again and said out loud, "be careful of the street-car lines".  the craft was very close to the streetcar electrical wires and i was worried it was going to crash into the lines.  it was gently maneuvering around the electrical lines to my amazement.  

the total time i was seeing the object was perhaps 10 minutes.  i immediately called and woke up my mother who lived just east of me.  she went outside but did not see anything.  i then called my fiancé who did not believe me.  my mother later told my siblings and i faced some ridicule, especially from my brother so i decided not to officially report the event.  it has haunted me all these years and i have felt very guilty for not reporting the event because i know it was real and perhaps it could of helped someone else who had also seen the object verify their account.  after all these years, i am now reporting the event but do not want my name to be used please.
content.summary: Ufo seemed to be resting on the rooftop of the apartment across the street.  it ascended up to my window height (5 storey building) and came towards my window and hovered outside of my window.  it then proceeded to gently travel east along the street.

content.detailedDescription:
this video footage was captured from my webcam and security software that is time stamped, on july 28th, 2015 beginning at 4:30am mst.  i live in ontario, oregon.  my name is sorte` aura. i'm a female.  i have been a psychic since childhood and have seen many ufo's, but never captured any  video or photos of ufo's.

i captured an orb/et with wings and antennas on my webcam video early this morning, on july 28th, 2015, while it was still dark outside. my webcam is sitting in my dining room window ceil and i have a webcam in my living room window ceil.

i was asleep when this orb was captured on video.  i live by myself and no noise was in my apartment. it is very quiet at night in this neighborhood.  you can hear a pencil dropped outside at night.   i hear a binaural beat in the background of all of the videos.  i never heard anything at night with the audio turned on my webcam, except for this morning. we don't have crickets around here.

i saw an orb flying past my dining room window a week ago on the webcam screen of my computer, and the motion detector on my webcam security software did not capture it, and no screenshot or video was recorded. when i looked out of the dining room window i saw nothing.  i can only see these orbs on the webcam screen.  so i decided to turn on 24 hour video recording on my security software, and turn on audio and lights on my webcam in the dining room window at night while i sleep.  


attached is 4 short video clips of a close up picture of an orb who spreads its wings and its antennas.  it has rainbow colors on the edges.  it changes shapes. on the back of the orb was a red tail that only appeared in one part of the video and was wagging at warp speed.  i noticed when it was flying across the top of my dining room window, it became longer and its legs were hanging.  when landing on my dining room window screen, it changed shape and was smaller and legs were pulled inside of it, like a plane would pull up wheels after take off.

this is startling video footage.  this is the real thing. i never saw anything like it. i watched the video as the orb flew back and forth and across my dining room window.  i was in shock at what i saw.  i felt excitement and was starring at the video.  i played the video recordings over and over again.  then i said to myself, i need to report this now to someone important.  i walked in circles thinking about what i have on video. amazing footage.

i decided to include the video clip captured at 6:12 am which is me reaching under the curtains and turning off the lights on the webcam. everyone can see the dining room window and screen (with spots on it), is the same in the daylight as it was when the orb was flying in front of it in the dark.

next, the orb stopped and sat on my window screen and posed for the webcam, then it flew so fast it looks like it disappeared into thin air.  last, it appeared at the top of the dining room window, looking down right at my webcam, and then the recording just stopped on its own, or the et turned off the recorder. my recording did not start again till daylight at 6:12 am. what was really creepy is that on the 6:12am video clip i still hear the binaural beats in the background, which made me think, "is it still here and i just can't see it?"


i included photos of orbs and a cigar shaped ufo that was outside in front of my apartment, and was captured on my webcam a week ago, from my living room window. i was awake that night and when i saw these orbs on my webcam screen which was streaming at the time.  i looked out my front window and saw nothing.  i looked at my webcam screen again and saw the orbs, looked out the window again and saw nothing.  the same thing happened when i saw the cigar shaped ufo in the street in front of my apartment on the webcam screen.  i looked out the window and saw nothing, looked at the webcam screen and saw the ufo.  i was wide awake. i can see them on my webcam screen, but not directly looking at them with my own eyes.


these videos are date and time stamped. i included the screenshots from my webcam in the living room window of 2 orbs.  one on my front lawn and one on the sidewalk in front of my apartment. my apartment is one floor. also, there are 2 screenshots of the same cigar shaped ufo that increased in size and changed shapes.  the ufo was captured from my webcam in my living room window ceil, on july 23rd, 2015.  the screenshots of the orbs captured by my webcam in living room window were taken on july 20th and 21st, 2015.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Video of orb/et changed shape, spread wings, and legs w/red tail.
